title: Unable to gift Soulhunter Kayn
body: As the title suggests, I am unable to gift the Soulhunter Kayn skin. I have sufficient RP, the skin is available for me to purchase for myself, but when I attempt to purchase it for my friend it no longer appears in the shop. I know he definitely owns regular Kayn, so why wouldn't this be available?

replies.body: There are a couple other [**gifting requirements**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752964) like needing to be friends for 24 hours and neither one of you can have an active suspension as well.
